name: Industry Vantage
tag_list: industry-hubs, industry-marketplaces, online-supplier-guides, suppliers, non-dues-revenue, industry-news-feeds, food-industry, solid-waste-recycling, renewable-energy, information-technology, it, cloud-computing, cyber-security, baking-industry, packaging
overview:
Industry Vantage provides Trade Associations and Industry Groups with online industry marketplaces, mobile venues, industry e-newsletters, ad & media publishing and non-dues revenue.

Associations can keep their brand top of mind with their core and supplier members, and attract prospective members. Our highly-relevant and proprietary ad-supported media publications create high engagement, retention and revenue.

Outreach is embedded in everything we do; we help define outreach objectives and gather member / supplier data to enhance your retention, referrals and revenue.

Example sites at: http://www.SnackFoodIndustryMarketplace.com, or http://www.WasteandRecyclingMarketplace.com
